tool.name: ScriptManager: Two-color Heatmap
tool.description: Generate heat map using CDT files.
tool.command:
#set output_dir = $output_heatmap.files_path mkdir -p $output_dir && cp $input_bed 'tmp.bed' && cp $input_bam 'tmp2.bam' && samtools index tmp2.bam tmp2.bam.bai && python $__tool_directory__/sleep.py && java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager_owlangFork-0.121-dev.jar read-analysis tag-pileup 'tmp.bed' 'tmp2.bam' -M pileup #if str($level_options.level) == "advance" and str($level_options.read) == "read_1" : --read1 #end if #if str($level_options.level) == "advance" and str($level_options.read) == "read_2" : --read2 #end if #if str($level_options.level) == "advance" and str($level_options.read) == "both" : --all-reads #end if #if str($level_options.level) == "advance" and str($level_options.read) == "midpoint" : --midpoint #end if
#if str($level_options.level) == "advance" : #if str($level_options.smoothing_options.smoothing) == "window_smooth_value": -W '$level_options.smoothing_options.window_size' #end if #if str($level_options.smoothing_options.smoothing) == "gauss_smooth_value": -G '$level_options.smoothing_options.half_window' '$level_options.smoothing_options.std' #end if -s '$level_options.shift' -b '$level_options.bin_size_output' --cpu $level_options.cpus -n '$level_options.min_insert' -x '$level_options.max_insert' #end if -o 'composite_data.out' && java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager_owlangFork-0.121-dev.jar figure-generation heatmap 'pileup_sense.cdt' -o 'sense.png' #if str($figure_options.figure) == "define" : -x '$figure_options.pixel_width' -y '$figure_options.pixel_height' -a '$figure_options.abs_threshold' -p '$figure_options.percent_threshold'
#if str($figure_options.sense_color_options.sense_color) == "sense_tab" : -c '$figure_options.sense_color_options.sense_tab_value' #end if #if str($figure_options.sense_color_options.sense_color) == "sense_hex" : -c '$figure_options.sense_color_options.sense_hex_value' #end if #else: -c '0000FF' #end if && java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager_owlangFork-0.121-dev.jar figure-generation heatmap 'pileup_anti.cdt' -o 'anti.png' #if str($figure_options.figure) == "define" : -x '$figure_options.pixel_width' -y '$figure_options.pixel_height' -a '$figure_options.abs_threshold' -p '$figure_options.percent_threshold'
#if str($figure_options.antisense_color_options.antisense_color) == "antisense_tab" : -c '$figure_options.antisense_color_options.antisense_tab_value' #end if #if str($figure_options.antisense_color_options.antisense_color) == "antisense_hex" : -c '$figure_options.antisense_color_options.antisense_hex_value' #end if #else: -c 'FF0000' #end if
&& java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager_owlangFork-0.121-dev.jar figure-generation merge-heatmap 'sense.png' 'anti.png' -o 'merge.png' && mv merge.png '$output_heatmap'

param.name: level
param.label: use bioinformatic default or advance options

param.name: read
param.label: Options for accounting tags in tag-pileup plot
param.option: both 5' end of read 1 and 3' end of read 2
midpoint of 5' end of read 1 and 3' end of read 2 (under development)

param.name: window_size
param.label: window size for smoothing in bp

param.name: half_window
param.label: half size of smoothing window, unit: std

param.name: figure
param.label: use figure properties default or define figure properties

param.name: abs_threshold
param.label: use the specified value for contrast thresholding

param.name: percent_threshold
param.label: use the specified percenttile for contrast thresholding
